duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively sell and recruit through various channels (job boards, networking, lead generation platforms, and cold calling)
Identify prospects that would be potential users of staffing/MSP/VMS services.
Build and develop strong relationships with hiring managers via phone, email, text, social media, and in-person.
Execute daily, weekly, monthly activity metrics that produce results (calls, emails, in-person meetings and client visits)
Close the sale and negotiate pricing.
Source, interview, and select candidates – building a pipeline of potential candidates.
Present and place qualified temporary and direct hire candidates to customers for consideration
Provide detailed assignment information and details to temporary/direct hire employees to ensure they are prepared for the assignment/job.
Monitor temporary employee attendance and performance.
Troubleshoot and problem solve issues that come up from customers and temporary associates.
Maintain customer and employee records to ensure completeness and accuracy.
Performs other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, HR, or a related field (Master's preferred)
